column1:
Overall Negative Sentiment Percentages over the Years
Cleanliness: 15.78%
Amenities: 14.32%
Location: 19.60%
Services: 25.54%
General: 20.45%
Value: 23.09%

Suggestions on What Can Be Done to Improve 
Cleanliness: Improve cleanliness of the overall environment 
Amenities: Increase the number and variety of amenities available 
Location: Improve the accessibility of the location 
Services: Increase the efficiency and quality of services provided 
General: Increase customer engagement and satisfaction 
Value: Lower prices or provide promotional discounts
